mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO preSale (preSaleNum, subject, content, species, type, gender, lineage, month, price, deposit, vaccin, num) VALUES(preSale_seq.NEXTVAL,#{subject},#{content},#{species},#{type}, #{gender},#{lineage},#{month},#{price},#{deposit},#{vaccin},#{num})
INSERT INTO preSalePhoto(photoNum, saveFilename,preSaleNum) VALUES(preSalePhoto_seq.NEXTVAL, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preSaleNum})
